title: Get Help
subtitle: Connect with local mutual aid groups anonymously

step1.title: Create a Mailbox
step1.description: We'll give you a secret passphrase. No email or phone needed.

step2.title: Describe Your Need
step2.description: Select a category (rent, food, utilities) and your area.

step3.title: Groups Respond
step3.description: Local mutual aid groups will see your request and send encrypted messages.

step4.title: Check Back
step4.description: Return with your passphrase to read messages and contact groups directly.

passphrase.title: Your Secret Passphrase
passphrase.description: This passphrase is the only way to access your mailbox. Write it down somewhere safe.
passphrase.warning: If you lose this passphrase, you cannot recover your mailbox. There is no reset option.
passphrase.confirmRequired: Please confirm you have saved your passphrase

createMailbox.title: Create Anonymous Mailbox
createMailbox.selectCategory: What kind of help do you need?
createMailbox.regionHelper: This helps connect you with groups that serve your area

mailboxCreated.title: Mailbox Created
mailboxCreated.description: Your anonymous mailbox is ready. Groups in your area can now see your request and send you messages.
mailboxCreated.rememberPassphrase: Remember: you need your passphrase to check for messages.
mailboxCreated.checkBackSoon: Check back in a day or two to see if any groups have responded.

checkMailbox.title: Check Your Mailbox
checkMailbox.notFound: Mailbox not found. It may have been deleted.

messages.title: Your Messages
messages.noMessagesDescription: Groups haven't responded yet. Check back in a day or two.
messages.contactGroup: Contact this group directly using the information in their message.

deleteMailbox.title: Delete Mailbox
deleteMailbox.warning: This will permanently delete your mailbox and all messages. This cannot be undone.

inactivityWarning.title: Important: Auto-Deletion
inactivityWarning.message: Your mailbox will be automatically deleted after 7 days of inactivity. Check back regularly to keep it active.

privacy.title: Your Privacy
privacy.encrypted: Messages are encrypted - only you can read them
privacy.autoDelete: Mailboxes are deleted after 7 days of inactivity
privacy.noLogs: No logs of your IP address or location

groupView.title: Help Requests
groupView.description: Anonymous requests from people in your service area
groupView.noRequests: No help requests matching your service area
groupView.replyPlaceholder: Include how they can contact your group...
groupView.replyHelper: This message will be encrypted. Only the requester can read it.
groupView.alreadyReplied: You have already replied to this request

tombstones.title: Past Requests
tombstones.description: Requests you responded to that have been deleted

errors.failedToCreate: Failed to create mailbox. Please try again.
errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load mailbox. Please try again.
errors.failedToDelete: Failed to delete mailbox. Please try again.
errors.failedToSendReply: Failed to send reply. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
